channel.title: Automatic search?(Dunno what it's called)
channel.description: I have seen a few website where the search bar pretty much already searches for the term you typed in before you even hit search and was wondering how I could do that. I'm not really sure what it's called entirely but I'm sure someone here will know what I mean. XD

item.title: Automatic search?(Dunno what it's called)
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

http://www.quackit.com/html_5/tags/html_datalist_tag.cfm

Would recommend this with a fallback for older browsers.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatic search?(Dunno what it's called)
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

It’s called autocomplete.

jqueryui.com/autocomplete/

Read full topic
